name: Day Job (Hazelpy)
description:
"Another day of tossin' others' trash... Can life get any worse?" - Bob, 2022

In this endless runner you try to toss as much trash into the garbage truck as possible before the road eventually becomes too littered with trash bags.

Originally was planning to make this for this week's Trijam, but went over the time limit & decided to just make it it's own thing.

All music and art was made by me this time :D
